author: amos:ez.no
msg: - Improved error handling of parsers, now each parser has an internal state
variable which can be used to generate an error message if they fail.
* The exact failing parser is found by traversing $subParser until the end is
* Error message is taken from getErrorMessage() and optionally details from
getErrorDetails(). These can be implemented by parsers to give meaninful info.
* Old fail() methods are removed, no need for this complicated way of handling
* skipComment() will now perform proper error handling if the comment syntax
* New exception ezcTemplateElementParserException which is used for the failing
- New method findNonLowercase() in ezcTemplateElementParser which advances the
cursor position until an uppercase or non-alphabetic character is found.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Typo and added missing docs dirs
